description:
A couple new characters will soon be making their presence felt on The Vampire Diaries Season 5.《吸血鬼日记》第五季很快就会迎来一大批新角色。

In newly-released photos from The Vampire Diaries Season 5 Episode 16 ("While You Were Sleeping"), we'll meet Chris Brochu a Luke, a gay college student who will have a secret agenda and seemingly won't be getting along with Katherine...在最新发布的《吸血鬼日记》第5季16集的剧照中，我们就看到了Chris Brochu 扮演的同性恋大学生Luke，这个角色有自己的秘密任务，并且和Katherine会有过节...

... or is that Elena? Will she be resurrected by the time this installment airs on March 20?...又或者不是Katherine而是Elena？这要看在3月20日播出的《吸血鬼日记》中Katherine复活了没有。

We've already met Caitlin McHugh as Sloan, meanwhile, but it looks like she'll be getting up close and way too personal with Stefan in a few weeks.在《吸血鬼日记》第五季中我们看到了Caitlin McHugh扮演的Sloan，在接下来几周的剧情里，这个叫Sloan的角色跟Stefan的关系似乎会发展到很密切的程度。

title: 《吸血鬼日记》首位同性恋角色登场
